data.name: Milicias Campaign, Evacuation of Hon
data.desc: Sp surprise Fleet, after which one Yucatan militia campaign against Settlement
data.agents_sp: Gov Roque Soberanis y Centeno [missg] militia
data.prim_n: AGN R ced vol 26 exp 27 ff 52-55v [Madrid a 16 nov 1694]
data.note:
Upper End inferred /v Barke B 107 fn 367, though post-dates AGN item cited therein / Possibly 1 Frig 2 Brigs 27 Eng 5 Neg seized /v Barke B 108, but cites AGI item referring only to TÃ©rminos = MEXICO,1080,L.47 ff 79r-81r / Not included in loss tallies
 Possibly see Amsterdam den 25 February. [...] Tot London had men brieven van Jamaica van de 8 November, meldende dat het schip Allegator, geladen met ontrent 400 Lasten Campechiehout, zeilende uyt Baey van Honduras, op het Govers Rif was verongeluk:, en dat niets als het volk was geborgen, 't welk tot Jamaica was aengekomen. /Amsterdam Courant no 25 [26 Feb 1695] p 2 [https://resolver.kb.nl/resolve?urn=ddd:011025707:mpeg21:a0006]
